1. Nintendo Switch 2 leak about dev kits lacking a 4K output contradicts earlier reports on specs  Notebookcheck
  2. Developers Say Nintendo Switch 2 Dev Kits Don’t Have 4K Output  Insider Gaming
  3. Nintendo Switch 2 leak suggests console won't be as powerful as we thought  GAMINGbible
  4. Nintendo Switch 2 Leak Reveals Dock Supports 4K 60Hz Output via Realtek Chip  The Game Post
  5. Imran Khan says Nintendo has denied Embracer Group Switch 2 dev kits  My Nintendo News

item.title: The Light Phone III and the search for the perfect minimalist smartphone - The Verge
item.description:
1. The Light Phone III and the search for the perfect minimalist smartphone  The Verge
  2. Light Phone III review: everything in moderation  The Verge
  3. I switched to a high-end dumbphone for a week, and it put E Ink (and my iPhone) to shame  ZDNET
  4. Minimalist Light Phone ditches E Ink, adds film-camera-inspired snapper  New Atlas
  5. Minimalist Light Phone 3 launches with a maximalist $799 price  9to5Google
